items.sentence: Let\'s find a solution that\'s acceptable to everyone.
Tom started dating Mary when they were in high school.
Tom still loves Mary, and I think she still loves him.
Tom has willingly done everything we\'ve asked him to.
Tom hasn\'t been able to go to school for three weeks.
If it\'s not too much trouble, I would like some help.
If there\'s anything you want to do, you should do it.
I forgot to tell Tom where the meeting is going to be.
She couldn\'t convince him to accept a personal check.
Tom was accused of putting something in Mary\'s drink.
